Notes.Text:
This update for slurm fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-41914: Fixed a filesystem handling race conditions that could lead to an attacker taking control of an arbitrary file. (bsc#1216207)

Vulnerabilities.Description: SchedMD Slurm 23.02.x before 23.02.6 and 22.05.x before 22.05.10 allows filesystem race conditions for gaining ownership of a file, overwriting a file, or deleting files.
